titleStmt.title: Articles of peace & commerce between the most serene and mighty prince Charles II. by the grace of God, King of Great Britain, France and Ireland, defender of the Christian faith, &c. and the most illustrious lords, the Bashaw, Dai, Aga, and governours of the famous city and kingdom of Algiers concluded by Sir Edw. Spragge knight, Admiral of His Majesties fleet in the Mediterranean, Novemb. 29. Old Stile, 1671. Published by His Majesties command.
Treaties, etc. Algeria, 1671-12-09
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
Spragge, Edward, Sir, d. 1673.
Algeria. Treaties, etc. England and Wales, 1677-12-09.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: The New Style date of the treaty is 9 Dec. 1677.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
